document.full_text: medtronic inc has won u.s. approval for a new generation of implantable defibrillators designed to cut back on inappropriate shocks delivered by the devices, the company said on monday.
document.title: medtronic wins approval for new defibrillators
lines_and_colors: medtronic inc has won u.s. approval for a new generation of implantable defibrillators designed to cut back on inappropriate shocks delivered by the devices, the company said on monday.
